channel.title: Youtube -
channel.description: How many views do you need to get Paid by youtube? Anyone kno.

item.title: Youtube -
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:10, topic:425701”][quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=528362.msg3853686#msg3853686 date=1324218311]
You must make a video atleast once a week, get a lot of views and likes on it, over 1k subscribes. That’s it basically. You also make 5 cents per view.
[/quote]I thought it was something like $1 per 1K views.[/quote]You can also get money from people liking your video from this website.

Read full topic

item.title: Youtube -
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

read up on adsense for info on how much u get paid. you get paid through adsense. ive had $22 page rpm once. which i would guess isnt that high. i need to read more into adsense myself. im pretty sure that opera method wouldnt make you any extra revenue from the first view and may ever jeopardize that adsense account with fraud clicking or whatever they call it; and revenue is based on daily unique IP’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Youtube -
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:8, topic:425701”]You must make a video atleast once a week, get a lot of views and likes on it, over 1k subscribes. That’s it basically. You also make 5 cents per view.[/quote]I thought it was something like $1 per 1K views.

item.title: Youtube -
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

as many as you want, there’s this thing called opera. Go to your video and use the Reload every feature (set it on 5 seconds). If you leave it on all night you’ll get 5k+ views, either that or it will freeze on 328

Read full topic

item.title: Youtube -
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

[quote=“Pr0ject pvp, post:6, topic:425701”][quote author=mihalich link=topic=528362.msg3852916#msg3852916 date=1324162291]
A lot, doing it just for the money isn’t worth it and you most likely won’t go far doing it just for that.
[/quote]
I heard fags like sparc Mac and no1s perfect make like $80,000 a year?[/quote]
Its all rumors but possibly. But they are basically the 2 most watched RS youtubers. Getting to a spot like that takes more effort than you’d think and you’re better off getting a real job instead of relying on the internet for money.

Read full topic
